facade

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    This class is a part of the facade pattern layer. The class which manages the customer user's request for using methods with customer functionality after a successful login. The class uses the methods of the CustomerDBDAO and the Coupon DBDAO classes - which communicates with the data base. In addition, this class also catches any related exceptions that might occur.
    Version:
    1.0 February 20, 2017.
    Author:
    Ehud Perlman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerFacade()
      Constructs the class of the customer facade and creating new relevant DBDAO objects for the use of the facade with the DBDAO objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerFacade

        public CustomerFacade()
        Constructs the class of the customer facade and creating new relevant DBDAO objects for the use of the facade with the DBDAO objects.

    • Method Detail

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        This method is for the customer user to purchase different company coupons from different companies. it uses the purchaseCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class the execute the purchase at the system.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon object representing the coupon that the customer wants to purchasse.

      • getAllPurchasedCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCoupons()
        This method get from the data base a list of all the purchased coupons of the customer logged in. It uses the getCoupons method from the customerDBDAO class.
        Returns:
        customerDBDAO.getCoupons() - An array list of Coupon objects of all the purchased coupons of that customer.

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCouponsByType(CouponType type)
        This method get from the data base a list of all the purchased coupons of the customer logged in. It uses the getCoupons method from the customerDBDAO class. After that it creates a new list of only those of the received specific type of coupons purchased by the customer.
        Parameters:
        type - - the specific coupon type we want for the type of coupons that will be in the list.
        Returns:
        allPurchasedCouponsByType - An array list of Coupon objects of all the purchased coupons of that customer that are only of the received type.

      • getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(double price)
        This method get from the data base a list of all the purchased coupons of the customer logged in. It uses the getCoupons method from the customerDBDAO class. After that it creates a new list of only those at the received specific price or below it, of coupons purchased by the customer.
        Parameters:
        price - - the specific coupon price received that we want the coupons that will be in the list to have. Or a price below it.
        Returns:
        allPurchasedCouponsByPrice - An array list of Coupon objects of all the purchased coupons of that customer that are only at the received price or below it.

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login(java.lang.String custName,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                ClientType clientType)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        The login method for the customer client type user. After receiving the parameters, while the clientType is of customer kind, it calls the login method in customerDBDAO and there checks the credentials and if the login is successful, it receives true value in the result boolean and then returns CouponClientFacade of the type CustomerFacade and the user can start using the customer different methods. if the login is unsuccessful, the facade is not returned.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientFacade
        Parameters:
        custName - - - the user name of the user customer that wants to log in.
        password - - the password of the user that wants to log in.
        clientType - - the client type of the user that wants to log in.
        Returns:
        login - returns the CouponClientFacade object of CustomerFacade kind, or a null value.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
